structure.unit: DIVISION 2. CIVIL SERVICE FOR COUNTY EMPLOYEES

law.catch_line: Review of County Manager's decision in personnel disciplinary actions.

text.section:
Sec. 2-47.1. Review of County Manager's decision in personnel disciplinary actions.
The County Manager's decision shall be subject to review in accordance with Florida Appellate Rules. For purposes of such review, any original jurisdictional notices required to be filed under the Florida Appellate Rules, shall be filed with the Personnel Director of Miami-Dade County. The Personnel Department shall provide the index and record on appeal when required by and in accordance with the Florida Appellate Rules. A fee may be charged by the Personnel Department for the preparation and transmission of the record on appeal to the Circuit Court. Such fees shall not exceed the amount charged from time to time by the Clerk of the Circuit Court for similar services.
